title: Spicy fruit salad
ingredients: ['1 red onion, halved and thinly sliced', '1 ripe but firm mango', '2 kiwi fruit, peeled and thinly sliced', '1/4 cucumber, thinly sliced', 'Chilli and coriander dressing', '1 fresh red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 teaspoon clear honey', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', 'salt and pepper']
